name: Arab Resource and Organizing Center
description: The Arab Resource and Organizing Center (AROC) works to empower and organize our community towards justice and self-determination for all people. They envisions powerful and liberated Arab communities living with dignity from here to our homelands. They see the liberation of Arab people inextricably tied to the liberation of all people of color.
